AirfieldInclusionRadius.label: Airfield Inclusion Radius
AirfieldInclusionRadius.help: Radius to search for airfields to include in mission (in meters)

KeepAAASpread.help: Distance from waypoint box to keep AAA

KeepAirfieldSpread.help: Distance from waypoint box to keep an airfield

MaxGroundTargetDistance.label: Max distance to target
MaxGroundTargetDistance.help: Max distance from front to ground target

RandomShips.label: Number of ships above base
RandomShips.help: The possible number of ships above the base value

WindsockDistance.label: Windsock Distance
WindsockDistance.help: Distance in meters wind sock is placed from middle of runway
